alert.note: Alert for Door; Kewaunee; Manitowoc (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 11:52AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Showes and scattered thunderstorms will impact portions of Kewaunee, Door and Manitowoc Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1151 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and scattered thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Cedar River to 7 miles southwest of Egg Harbor to near Algoma to near Manitowoc to Plymouth. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Algoma around 1155 AM CDT. Egg Harbor around 1200 PM CDT. Jacksonport and Ephraim around 1205 PM CDT. Newport State Park around 1220 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Krok, Maribel, Peninsula State Park, Larrabee, Valmy, Curran, Slovan, Gregorville, Rankin and Rock Island State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
